item.title: Opinion: Bitcoin Drops Over 10% While Ethereum Shows Strength, First Time Since 2021, Signaling a Bearish Outlook Ahead
item.description: On August 27th, according to VanEck analyst @matthew_sigel, BTC has recently seen a cumulative decline of more than 10%, while ETH has not. This is the first time this market trend has occurred since 2021. It is reported that since 2020, this scenario has only happened 52 times.Based on historical data, after this situation takes place:? BTC: The median drop in the next 7 days is 2.8%, and the median drop in the next 30 days is 15.6%;? ETH: There is a +6.4% increase in 7 days and a -8.4% drop in 30 days.@matthew_sigel thereby indicated that this is a bearish signal for the overall cryptocurrency market. ETH provides short-term support, but both show a trend of reversal.

item.title: Affected by Whale Manipulation, Trader X's XPL Short Position Was Completely Liquidated, Resulting in a $4.59 Million Loss
item.description: On August 27th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, due to the whale's manipulation on Hyperliquid, the price of XPL plummeted sharply. As a result, victim 0xC2Cb's XPL short position was fully liquidated, leading to a loss of $4.59 million.

item.title: Nasdaq-listed company KindlyMD plans to issue $5 billion in shares to expand its Bitcoin treasury business
item.description: On August 27th, as reported by The Block, the Nasdaq-listed healthcare company KindlyMD announced on Tuesday that it has submitted a shelf registration statement and intends to issue up to $5 billion worth of stock on the market. The company indicated that it plans to utilize the net proceeds to support general corporate purposes, such as expanding its Bitcoin treasury.The company's press release further stated that this plan enables the company to issue and sell up to $5 billion worth of common stock through various sales agents, including D.A. Davidson, Cantor Fitzgerald, and B. Riley Securities.

item.title: Viewpoint: Hyperliquid Revenue Misaligned with HYPE Market Cap, HYPE Price Undervalued
item.description: On August 27th, based on the analysis of @infinitybanyan, Hyperliquid accounts for 36% of the total revenue of all cryptocurrencies. Meanwhile, the market capitalization of the HYPE only makes up 1.2% of the total cryptocurrency market capitalization ($3.76 trillion).

item.title: Yesterday, the US Ethereum spot ETF saw a net inflow of $455 million, while the Bitcoin spot ETF saw a net inflow of $88.1 million.
item.description: On August 27th, as monitored by Farside Investors, yesterday the net inflow of the US Bitcoin spot ETF was $88.1 million. IBIT had a net inflow of $45.3 million and FBTC had a net inflow of $14.5 million.In addition, the net inflow of the Ethereum spot ETF was $455 million. The main ETF with net inflow was BlackRock ETHA, which had a net inflow of $323.1 million.

item.title: Following the news of a commitment from JPMorgan Chase, Numerai (NMR) continued to surge, with a 123% price increase in the last 24 hours.
item.description: On August 27th, based on market data, Numerai (NMR) keeps surging. It has a 24-hour gain of 123% and is currently priced at $17.91.Previously reported, Numerai received a commitment of up to $500 million in investment from JPMorgan Chase.

item.title: Data: Trading Volume Increases by 30% After Aerodrome Integrates with Coinbase DEX
item.description: August 27th: Based on Aerodrome Finance data, since August 8th when it integrated with Coinbase DEX, the trading volume has witnessed a 30% increase. During the two weeks prior to the integration, Aerodrome's trading volume was $8.7 billion. However, in the two weeks following the integration, the trading volume rose to $11.3 billion.

item.title: SOL Surges Past $200, with a 24-hour Gain of 4.81%
item.description: On August 27th, according to HTX market data, SOL has exceeded $200 and is currently trading at $200.1, with a 24-hour percentage change of 4.81%.

item.title: BlackRock's Securitize CEO: RWA Tokenization Represents $20 Trillion Market Potential, Ethereum Leads the Space
item.description: August 27th. The CEO of Securitize, Carlos Domingo, under the Belldex brand, made a post via the Ethereum official X account. He stated that Real World Assets (RWA) represent a market potential exceeding $20 trillion, yet only a small fraction of it is on-chain. In terms of market value, Ethereum is the leading blockchain in the RWA field, but we are still in the early stages. Even a 1% market share could bring an opportunity of over $200 billion.Domingo pointed out that Securitize mints on-chain native assets, with 68% (over $23 billion) on Ethereum. Many issuers believe that Ethereum provides the safest, most composable, and censorship-resistant foundation for tokenized financial products. Tokenized stocks are the next step in bringing real-world financial markets onto the blockchain. Since the global stock market is valued at approximately $100 trillion, it is difficult to overstate the long-term opportunity of anchoring these assets on Ethereum.

item.title: Metaplanet extensively exercised stock options and redeemed a portion of the bonds early
item.description: August 27th - Metaplanet Inc. made an announcement today. From August 14th to 26th, 2025, EVO FUND substantially exercised its Series 20 stock subscription rights, with a total of 27,500,000 shares, accounting for 14.86% of the total issued shares. Meanwhile, the company used the funds obtained from the exercise of subscription rights to partially redeem ￥5,250,000,000 of the Series 19 common bonds. After multiple redemptions in July and early August, the total redemption amount reached ￥21,000,000,000.After this stock issuance, the company's total issued shares increased to 739,714,340 shares, and the unexercised subscription rights decreased to 460,000 rights (equivalent to 46,000,000 shares).
